services package¶

Submodules¶

services.car_service module¶

car_service.py

Service layer for car-related business logic in the car rental system. Provides methods to add, update, delete, and retrieve cars by interacting with the DAO and model layers.

class services.car_service.CarService¶

Bases: object

Service class for car management operations. Handles business logic and delegates database operations to CarDAO.

static add_car(make: str, model: str, year: int, mileage: int, available_now: int, min_rent_period: int, max_rent_period: int, car_type: str) → bool¶

Add a new car to the database. Returns True if the operation is successful, False otherwise.

static delete_car(car_id: int) → bool¶

Delete a car from the database by car_id. Returns True if the operation is successful.

static get_available_cars()¶

Return a list of available cars from the database.

static update_car(car_id: int, **kwargs) → bool¶

Update car details by car_id. Accepts keyword arguments for fields to update. Returns True if the operation is successful.

services.email_service module¶

email_service.py

Service layer for sending email notifications in the car rental system. Provides methods to send approval and rejection emails to customers using SMTP.

class services.email_service.EmailService¶

Bases: object

Service class for handling email notifications. Uses SMTP to send emails for booking approvals and rejections.

SENDER_EMAIL = 'philip.car.rental@gmail.com'¶
SENDER_PASSWORD = 'rgbw mikh hbvp wrrd'¶
SMTP_PORT = 587¶
SMTP_SERVER = 'smtp.gmail.com'¶
static send_approval_email(to_email, car_id, start_date, end_date, amount)¶

Send an approval email to the customer for a successful car rental booking.

static send_email(to_email, subject, body)¶

Send a generic email with the given subject and body to the specified recipient.

static send_rejection_email(to_email, car_id, start_date, end_date)¶

Send a rejection email to the customer for a declined car rental booking.

services.rental_service module¶

rental_service.py

Service layer for rental-related business logic in the car rental system. Provides methods to book rentals, calculate fees, update statuses, and manage bookings by interacting with the DAO and model layers.

class services.rental_service.RentalService¶

Bases: object

Service class for rental management operations. Handles business logic and delegates database operations to RentalDAO.

static book_rental(user_id: int, car_id: int, start_date: str, end_date: str, total_fee: float) → bool¶

Book a rental for a car. Returns True if the operation is successful, False otherwise.

static calculate_rental_fee(car_id: int, start_date: str, end_date: str, extra_charges: float = 0.0) → float¶

Calculate the rental fee for a car between two dates, including any extra charges. Returns the calculated fee as a float.

static cancel_booking(rental_id: int, user_id: int) → bool¶

Cancel a booking for a user by rental_id. Returns True if the operation is successful, False otherwise.

static get_available_cars_for_specific_dates(start_date: str, end_date: str)¶

Get a list of available cars for specific dates. Returns a list of car records.

static get_bookings_for_user(user_id: int)¶

Get all bookings for a user by user_id. Returns a list of booking records.

static get_car_status_for_dates(start_date, end_date)¶

Get the status of cars for specific dates. Returns a tuple of (cars, car_status_dict).

static get_pending_rentals()¶

Return a list of pending rental requests from the database.

static update_booking(rental_id: int, user_id: int, start_date: str, end_date: str, car_id: int = None) → bool¶

Update a booking for a user (dates or car). Returns True if the operation is successful, False otherwise.

static update_rental_status(rental_id: int, status: str) → bool¶

Update the status of a rental (approve/reject) by rental_id. Returns True if the operation is successful.

services.user_service module¶

user_service.py

Service layer for user-related business logic in the car rental system. Provides methods for user registration, authentication, and password management by interacting with the DAO and model layers.

class services.user_service.AdminService¶

Bases: UserService

Service class for admin-specific operations. Inherits from UserService and adds admin password management.

static change_admin_password(username: str, old_password: str, new_password: str) → bool¶

Change admin password after verifying the old password. Returns True if the operation is successful, False otherwise.

class services.user_service.CustomerService¶

Bases: UserService

Service class for customer-specific operations. Inherits from UserService and adds customer password management and registration.

static change_customer_password(username: str, old_password: str, new_password: str) → bool¶

Change customer password after verifying the old password. Returns True if the operation is successful, False otherwise.

static register_customer(username: str, password: str, email: str) → bool¶

Register a new customer. Returns True if the operation is successful, False otherwise.

class services.user_service.UserService¶

Bases: object

Service class for user management operations. Handles registration and authentication, delegating database operations to UserDAO.

static login_user(username: str, password: str)¶

Login a user and return the appropriate User object (AdminUser, CustomerUser, or User) using UserFactory. Returns a User instance or None if authentication fails.

static register_user(username: str, password: str, email: str, role: str) → bool¶

Register a new user. Returns True if successful, False if username exists.
